overview: Most experts agree that global peak oil production, when demand exceeds supply, will occur within the next 15 years and will drastically change the very fabric of our industrialized world. As fossil fuels power every facet of the American economy, how can we avoid an energy crisis and a possible collapse of our economy?
tagline: As our global population and its appetite for energy rise drastically, resource depletion and global warming have become the most pressing issues facing humanity today.
title: Energy Crossroads
